summary: This code configures a tmux session for running tests. The session has two panes: one running Python client.py and another executing test.sh in Bash.

details.comment: This code configures a tmux session for running tests. The session has two panes: one running Python client.py and another executing test.sh in Bash.
details.content:
session_name: online_dog_cat_generator_test
start_directory: /root/Desktop/works/pyjom/tests/update_progressbar_network
windows:
- layout: main-horizontal
  options:
    main-pane-height: 30
  panes:
  - shell_command:
    - python3 client.py
  - shell_command:
    - bash test.sh
  window_name: progressbar window
